titles: The diseased maiden lover being a pleasant new song, to an excellent new tune, or, may be sung to the tune of, Bonny Nell.
publisher: Printed for F. Coles, T. Vere, and J. Wright,
notes: Place of publication from and date conjectured by Wing.
"The faithless lover. To the same tune" is printed on the same sheet in col. 3-4; woodcuts at head of each ballad.
Reproduction of the original in the Bodleian Library.
